Package com.decoded.zool

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ZoolDataBridge
    This represents a connection to a ZooKeeper instance.
    ZoolDataFlow
    This object is designed to transport data directly from ZooKeeper signals to your ZoolDataSink instances.
    ZoolDataSink
    Interface for an accepter of Zookeeper node data.
    ZoolWatcher
    Other classes use the ZoolDataBridgeImpl by implementing this method
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElasticInterval
    This can be used to start an interval aggressive and expand it until its max value
    EnvironmentConstants
    Constants used for the Zool Environment with respect the the local machine.
    HostAddress
    This object parses a remote host url, a service map node, and a service key into an organized set of data about the host itself.
    ZConst  
    Zool
    Zool is a Zookeeper Interface Client for Microservice Configuration and Coordination Zool can act as both the announcer hub, or the client zookeeperHost which announces itself among the other hosts on the network.
    ZoolAnnouncement
    DataObject stored on zookeeper for zool announced hosts in each service node created.
    ZoolDataBridgeImpl
    Watcher and Stat Callback for Zookeeper DataSink objects.
    ZoolDataFlowImpl
    The ZoolDataFlow accepts Zookeeper data, and directs it to each DataSink listening for data via node name.
    ZoolDataSinkImpl
    The ZoolDataSink accepts data from a ZoolDataFlow path watch.
    ZoolLoggingUtil  
    ZoolReader
    Reads Data from Zool
    ZoolServiceMesh
    This class wraps Zool and interacts with it as a Service announcement portal.
    ZoolServiceMeshClient
    An abstract Zool Service Mesh Client which can be extended for querying a Zool Service.
    ZoolSystemUtil
    A Utility for performing some important zool functions that are used in many places.
    ZoolWriter
    A Mechanism for writing data to Zookeeper through Zool
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ZConst.PathSeparator
    Convenience for path separation
    ZoolServiceMesh.MeshState
    The state of the Mesh
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ZoolServiceException
    For Zool Specific Exception Class.
